      • provideArrayBlockingQueueURI

        java.lang.String provideArrayBlockingQueueURI(java.lang.String groupID,

                                              throws java.lang.Exception

        groupID - ID of the synchronization group.
        componentID - ID of the calling component.
        Returns:
